snippet.title: Everything we know about the new iPhone that Apple will announce in September
snippet.content:
The phone hasn't even been announced yet, but there are already plenty of leaks and rumours swirling around about what to expect. If everything is true, we can expect some pretty drastic changes to the next iteration of Apple's flagship phone. Here's a look at everything we think we know so far.
Darren Weaver contributed reporting on a previous version of this article.
